Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:向

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+5411

Main pronunciation 主要发音: xiàng

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning not long ago (not many suns ago).

English senses 英语理解: toward, direction, trend

Usage example 用法举例: 曏前 xiàng qián (earlier)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 157

Shuowen 说文解字: 不久也從日鄉聲春秋傳曰曏役之三月

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 曏 from sun-day 日 rì and phonetic rural (乡)鄉郷鄕鄕𨞰 xiāng C624 嚮<曏> A271 向[嚮] simp 向.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :

Simplification rule : A271 向[嚮]

Simplification rule explained :
phonetic-part 向嚮 向 (north window)向東走 嚮 (direction, trend)方嚮

Variant rule : C624 嚮<曏>

Variant rule clarification :
嚮 (incined to, toward, direction) TW 曏 <once upon a time, period of time>

曏字的基本解释

曏
xiàng
同“向”⑤⑥。

曏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiàng］
［《廣韻》許亮切，去漾，曉。］
［《廣韻》許兩切，上養，曉。］
［《廣韻》式亮切，去漾，書。］
(1)不久以前；以往。
(2)介词。对着，朝着。
(3)明，表明。《庄子·秋水》：“證曏今故，故遥而不悶，掇而不跂，無時無止。”郭象注：“曏，明也。”成玄英疏：“既知小大非小大，則證明古今無古今也。”一说，往也。陆德明释文引崔譔曰：“曏，往也。”

曏字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　曏； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页500第27
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?許兩切，音響。【說文】不久也。《春秋傳》曰：曏役之三月。【玉篇】少時也。　又【廣韻】書兩切【集韻】始兩切，?音賞。又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?許亮切，音向。義?同。　又【儀禮·鄕射禮註】立曏所酬。○按與向同。　又【莊子·秋水篇】證曏今古。【郭註】曏，明也。【釋文】崔云：曏，往也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiàng］
["Guangyun" Xu Liang cuts, goes to Yang, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" Xu two cuts, upper raising, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" style bright cut, go to Yang, book. ]
(1) Not long ago; in the past.
(2) Prepositions. Face, move towards.
(3) Clearly, indicate. "Zhuangzi·Qiu Shui": "The evidence is the present and the reason, so it is far away and not boring, stubborn and not limped, all the time and endless." Guo Xiang's note: "Wealth, Ming Ye." Cheng Xuanying Shu: "Knowing that the small is big and not small. Big, it proves that there is no such thing as the past and the present. Lu Deming's interpretation quoted Cui's writing and said: "We are going to go."
